entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 11:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
